children.subject: Following up on my own post (poor taste, I know...), we've had some great responses, and I'm getting ready to shut this form down, so if you have an idea, go ahead and share it! I'll leave it open through Friday, October 15. What's one thing you've done that you wished later that you didn't do, or vice-versa?

history.content:
Dear Everyone,

We are working on a new webpage for incoming students (a little late for this year...), and we found an old page of advice from seniors to freshmen from 2013. It's interesting, but we'd like to put up some fresh words from current students. If you have something to share, please either send them here or just post them here.

We're not thinking about something long...maybe 25 words or fewer, looking back on your time at Berkeley, not just the last few months of chaos, and saying what you liked the best or wish you had done or are glad that you did and suggest that the new students do!

Heather
history.subject: Contribute your Advice to Incoming Students
